amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to initiate a proceeding in the WTO challenging any law of a country that is not a member of the OECD.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to initiate a proceeding in the WTO challenging any law of a country that is not a member of the OECD.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waters amendment (A028) Failed by recorded vote: 123 - 306 (Roll no. 247).
